players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the villager. Diana claims Bob is mafia, Bob claims Diana is mafia. One is lying. We need to decide who to trust."
Diana: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. I investigated him and he is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Bob out."
Charlie: "I believe Diana. Bob's claim that he investigated Diana as mafia doesn't make sense since Alice died last night. Diana is telling the truth - Bob is mafia."
You: "Diana is lying. I am the detective. If I were mafia, why would I claim detective? Diana is trying to frame me. Vote Diana."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the villager. Diana claims Bob is mafia, Bob claims Diana is mafia. One is lying. We need to decide who to trust."
You: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. I investigated him and he is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Bob out."
Charlie: "I believe Diana. Bob's claim that he investigated Diana as mafia doesn't make sense since Alice died last night. Diana is telling the truth - Bob is mafia."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I am the detective. If I were mafia, why would I claim detective? Diana is trying to frame me. Vote Diana."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
